"Trinitas":
"Trinitas is a kind of training facility that exists in Retem.

It is more difficult to complete than a Trainia, and the level of the enemies inside is based on the level of the highest-levelled Party Member."

"The Trinitas consists of multiple areas. You earn points for each level you clear and each side mission you complete, and at the end of the Quest, you earn rewards based on your total score.

If you fail an area's side missions too many times, you will fail the Quest immediately."
